name: MagnetiWrench!
description:
Submission for Butterscotch Shenanijam!

  • Theme: Wrenches 101
  • Achievements: Maverick

This was my first game jam ever! I had a lot of fun although time management was tough. The game is a fast-paced platformer where you throw a wrench that you can magnetize to move towards. It's only 10 levels, but I tried to make them a little challenging. Feedback welcome!

Controls:

  • WASD-Movement
  • Space Bar-Jump
  • Left Click-Throw and latch wrench
  • Right Click-Magnet towards wrench
